column4: Hi I just followed this tutorial https://help.ubuntu.com/community/CompositeManager/Xgl , but when I login to the new Xgl session, nothing happens for 10 seconds, then I get the gdm login screen back
ah cool, did you resolve the issue?
yes, i installed compiz, and rebooted, messed and it worked after awhile.
I just followed the tutorial from the wiki, but I only got so far, what should I do?
You mean I should look in the wiki for Compiz?
on the xgl one there should be a next page with compiz on it
oh i also did some gconf commands from the gentoo-wiki xgl page
I think I'm stuck at 'This procedure assumes that you have logged into your Xgl server session'
did you add the gdm script thing with gnome-session etc?
I'll recheck the files to be sure
anyway sorry i cant be of much help. i didnt do any more then what i said i did. rebooting sometimes is good too
I'm already happy I'm not alone in my problem :)
